articles.author: Reporting from Ukraine
articles.title: Frontline report: One number made India choose America over Russia in 24 hours - Euromaidan Press
articles.description: Tariffs threatened $186B in U.S. trade. Within a day, India ended its massive Russian oil deal. Here’s how one number drove the decision.
articles.content: Today, there are interesting updates from the Russian alliance. Here, India, a key member of the Russian BRICS alliance, surrendered to the threat of devastating US sanctions and is about to cut econ… [+4262 chars]
